name: lib/match.mjs
getParameterizedPath
description: Generates a express style regexp for a given route and stores in a Map

params.name: route
params.description: The route that should be converted into a regexp

return.description: Returns an object with param keys and a path regexp

name: findMatchingRoutePath
description: Finds a matching dynamic route from manifest

params.name: location
params.description: The window location that should be resolved

name: ./README.md
./README.md
./manual/overview.md
./manual/usage.md
content:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## Scaling

- **How do I scale and descale my inputs?**
  - The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the regression examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).
- **How do I cross validate, test/train split, K-fold, etc?**
  - (See above) The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the code examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).

name: ./CHANGELOG.md
content:
# Changelog

## 1.0.0 (2018-07-30)

- **Feat**
  - First Initial Release
- **Fix**
  - N/A
- **Chore**
  - Allow for multistep future forecasts in multivariate timeseries.
  - Add basic clustering example.
